body.name: Gel Seat Cushion for Long Sitting(Super Large & Thick) - Office Chair Car Seat Cushion for Back, Sciatica, Hip, Tailbone Pain Relief - Cool, Soft & Breathable Pillow with Non-Slip Cover for Wheelchair
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 6 hrs 5 mins
features: 【Super Large Surface & Soft】 ★This gel seat cushion for long sitting is specially designed super large, which is larger and thicker than other gel cushions. 19" long and 18" wide, which can better match with your chair.

【Relieve Pressure & Pain】★This gel chair cushion perfectly fits curve of hip, soft and without losing support force. Effectively relieves back pain, low back pain, sciatica, pressure sores, post-operative injuries or pregnancy pain and other issues caused by sitting for long periods of time.

【Cool & Non-slip】★Advanced cooling gel with unique honeycomb breathable design, increases air circulation, keep cool at the bottom for sedentary. With zipper design balck washable non-slip cover for easy cleaning.

【Widely Application】★Our multifunction gel seat cushion lightweght & foldable, suitable for various use scenarios: Office Chair, Computer Desk, Kitchen, Dining Room, Living Room, Patio, Couch, Recliner, Car, Truck, Train & Airplane Travel, Classrooms.

【Amazing Practical Gift】★This gel chair cushion can be used as a practical gift for family, friends and colleagues. Excellent comfort, effective support for the tailbone, to relieve the pressure on the hip caused by sedentary.

【Our Brand Promise】★Enjoy comfort to the fullest and not have to worry about butt pain from sitting on hard surfaces again. Give our Helishy seat cushions a try. If you are not satisfied, we'll provide a full refund!
body.description: Specification: Item Mame: Gel Seat Cushion Material: Premium Gel Color: Blue Gel Pad & Black Cover Size: 48.2*45.5/19*18 Weight: about 1300g/2.8LB Package Include: 1* Blue Seat Cushion; 1* Black Cover Features: 1. Restains Its Shape - Gel seat cushion won't lose its support even after long term use 2. Fits Most Chairs - Support in your computer chair, office chair, deep seat, car seat, or recliner 3. With Cover - Included a zipper design washable non-slip cover

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I mainly bought this to add a cushion for height purposes since my chair is defective and will not lift to its maximum height. I didn't want to buy a new chair. This is serving its purpose and saved me a couple of hundred dollars for the immediate future. It surpassed my expectations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must needd
reviews.reviewText: It's working out great. Feels comfortable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars a blit hard
reviews.reviewText: I thought this would be softer. I am 93 and have it on my chair. It seems quite hard. Is it supposed to be this hard? I wantd to to put on my chair whih is quite hard but it isnt very soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THIS ONE!
reviews.reviewText: I.ve gotten several, needed one for home office chair, and recliner. This worked best for my recliner..very happy with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great idea but not my cup of tea
reviews.reviewText: I love the feel of the cushion but I felt like I was moving constantly as the gel quivered and shivered under my ample bottom. If it was a bit more stable, maybe a thicker cover to help stablize it, I think it would work better. Worth a try if you need more cushioning than your chair has.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Pain from long drives was much less with this pad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the most uncomfortable cushion that I have ever bought. It's hard and lumpy. I would like to get my money back but I don't know how to return it. I'll just throw it away and try to forget about it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
